item.title: Why CSR Is As Vital To A Company As Sales Or Marketing
item.description:
Why CSR Is As Vital To A Company As Sales Or Marketing

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) cannot be dismissed as a mere farce. It needs to be deployed in action and also be eligible for the same bravery awards as sales or brand-building, so to say. This part of the organizational strategic plan is not about charity alone... in fact, there is no charity anywhere.

item.title: Will India Inc get relief on CSR spending?
item.description:
Will India Inc get relief on CSR spending?

Corporate Affairs Ministry not for mandating expenditure If the Corporate Affairs Ministry has its way, Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) spending will not be mandated and companies will be allowed to spend as they wish.
